metadata.description: The Grays are a cursed family. Dorian Gray IV, the last of his line, struggles with the realization that his personal demons are exactly that... a supernatural force that plagues not only the Grays but many of society's wealthiest families. Convinced his redemption is only secured through ridding the city of demons called the Morbi, Dorian launches an ongoing crusade for his soul.
metadata.name: Dorian Gray
